description: This course provides an on-campus immersion experience for students interested in improving
their oral language proficiency. Students engage in small and large group discussion, give
individual and group oral presentations, and review grammar and registers of language. They
also explore the notions of communicative competence and oral proficiency in order to become
more effective speakers. Taught in French. Prerequisite: FREN 232 or FREN 235, or equivalent.
Offered during Interim. Counts toward film studies concentration.
